All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Board
Class responsible for managing the game board
Board10x10Controller
Extends BoardController with functionality for 10x10 board
Board8x8Controller
Extends BoardController with functionality for 8x8 board
BoardController
Implements most of board8x8 and board10x10 functionality
Client
Client.class is responsible for communication with server
Color
Enum specifying color of the piece
Values: WHITE / BLACK
Communicator
Class responsible for sending info to players and getting input from them
Controller
Used to handle Client.class
GameInstance
Runnable class that handles running game
GameMode
Enum specifying possible game modes
Values:
ITALIAN,
GERMAN,
POLISH,
EXIT,
NOT_SELECTED
GameModeSelection
Runnable class that handles game selection
GameSelectionController
handles game_selection scene
GermanVariantBuilder
Class taking part in the implementation of the Builder Design Pattern.

Defines German version of abstract methods declared in the Variant Builder Interface:
- makeVariant()
- getVariant()
InfoPageController
Mainly used to set Label on info_page scene
ItalianVariantBuilder
Class taking part in the implementation of the Builder Design Pattern.

Defines Italian version of abstract methods declared in the Variant Builder Interface:
- makeVariant()
- getVariant()
Main
Main.class starts client app, initializes GUI and handles operations
Piece
Class managing the piece of the game
PolishVariantBuilder
Class taking part in the implementation of the Builder Design Pattern.

Defines Polish version of abstract methods declared in the Variant Builder Interface:
- makeVariant()
- getVariant()
Server
Main class in com.example.checkers.server, handles socket connections and running threads
Type
Enum specifying type of the piece
Values: MAN / KING
Variant
 
Variant.Winner
 
VariantBuilder
Interface taking part in the implementation of the Builder Design Pattern.

Contains abstract methods:
- makeVariant();
- getVariant();
implemented by specific VariantBuilders
VariantDirector
Class taking part in the implementation of the Builder Design Pattern.

Manages VariantBuilder
